title: Strengthening Clinical Competencies: Anatomy Curriculum Utilizing Blended Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the anatomical location of head and neck structures related to Fragile X syndrome with 80% accuracy
Learners can recreate anatomical structures as 3D models using the Patton 4-Step Approach
Learners can perform evaluation tasks applying anatomical knowledge acquired through Gagne's 9 Events of Instruction to real clinical cases with over 70% proficiency

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
